snippet.title: Company of Heroes: Eastern Front Channel Trailer
snippet.description:
What is Eastern Front?
Eastern Front is a free mod for Company of Heroes. Following the ethos of mimicking a Relic Entertainment expansion pack, Eastern Front has succeeded in adding a full Soviet faction packed with unique and exciting units to the existing armie as well as the rugged Ostheer - a unique new Axis faction who was designed from the ground up to counter the Soviets - a feat never before achieved in the Company of Heroes world.

Mission:
We are constantly working to improve Eastern Front; our dedicated and experienced development team has worked on the mod for over 6 years, and we don't intend to stop yet. The future will bring new campaigns, new reward units, further game mechanics and an overall better experience.

For more information on Company of Heroes: Eastern Front visit:
http://easternfront.org/
